title: Tiny doc bug: strconv pkg
body:
func ParseInt

func ParseInt(s string, base int, bitSize int) (i int64, err error)

ParseInt interprets a string s in an arbitrary base b (2 to 36) and returns the
corresponding value n. If b == 0, the base is taken from the string prefix: base 16 for
"0x", base 8 for "0", and base 10 otherwise. 

=============================
The description's first para should be something like:
=============================
ParseInt interprets a string s in the give base (2 to 36) and returns the corresponding
value i. If base is 0 its value is implied by the string's prefix: base 16 for
"0x", base 8 for "0", and base 10 otherwise.
